Description: Pottery ostracon, with one line of incised inscription - repeating the Jesus monogram (?), from the rim of a vessel, inside and below shoulder on outside painted black.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394063) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394063)
